column4: GRUB, doesnt accept input from my usb keyboard so i cannot choose windows xp from my menu anymore, any ideas?
If you are using GRUB2 you can try the usbkeyboard module, if you are using grub legacy I don't think anything like that exists
If you want to try usb keyboard support in grub2 add two lines to /etc/grub.d/40_custom "insmod usb.mod" and "insmod usb_keyboard.mod"
If you decide to do that please tell me how it goes
hw do i know if i have grub 2?
If you have the file /etc/grub.d/40_custom then you have grub2
